devdoc.details: A marketplace contract for trading in-game items with supply and demand dynamics similar to the Steam marketplace. All transactions are conducted with native MON.

EnforcedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is paused.

ExpectedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is not paused.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

buyGameItems(uint256[],uint256[]).details: Buy multiple game items from the marketplace at once

params.listingIds: Array of listing IDs to purchase
params.quantities: Array of quantities to buy for each listing

params.listingId: The ID of the listing to cancel

changeListingPrice(uint256,uint256).details: Change the price of a listing

constructor.details: Constructor to initialize the marketplace with required contract addresses

params._gameSave: Address of the game save contract

getActiveGameItemListings(string).details: Get all active listings for a specific game item

returns._0: activeListingIds Array of active listing IDs

getAllUniqueItemsWithPrices().details: Get all unique items with their lowest prices

returns.gameItemPrices: Array of lowest prices for each game item
returns.gameItemQuantity: Array of quantities for each game item

getGameItemEscrowBalance(address,string).details: Check how many items a user has in escrow

returns._0: The quantity of the item in escrow

getGameItemPriceHistory(string,uint256).details: Get the price history for a game item

params.limit: The maximum number of records to return (0 for all)

getLowestPriceListingForGameItem(string).details: Get the lowest priced listing for a game item

returns.listingId: The listing ID with the lowest price

listGameItem(string,uint256,uint256).details: List a game item on the marketplace

params.gameItemId: The ID of the game item as used in the game
params.price: The price per unit in MON (wei)
params.quantity: The quantity of the item to list

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setMarketplaceFee(uint256).details: Set the marketplace fee percentage (in basis points)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: VolatileMarketplace
